1.0.name: wordpress/wp-flip-image-free
1.0.description:
WP Flip Image Plugin is a great way to show your photo gallery and images in an elgant and smart way! One Click On The Image And It Flips Right Around To Reveal The Text and Link That You Want Your Visitors To See! It is just natural that you'll look for what's written on the image backside - WP Flip Image do just that!

You may use WP Flip Image in many ways: Photo gallery, Portfolio, Prudocts gallery, Social icons and many more!

Easy installation and configuration, copy and paste a short-code and you done!

Available languages for admin area

English, Spanish, German, Arabic, French, Italian, Finnish, Swedish

Free version allows creating one short-code only and choosing from 2 thumbnail gallery size (3x3 or 4x4).

UPGRADE to WP Flip Image Pro and get many additional features such:

  • Unlimited galleries to place on your website!

  • Slider Gallery option with many features!

  • Thumbnail style ga
